title: I still cannot believe this.
body: I Cannot Believe this. I still have no splash art after I uninstalled and then reinstalled league I went into a game this morning and I still have no splash art when I am loading in. Could someone please find out what is going on? I am the only one of my friends that has this problem and I have enough graphics and everything to deal with it and it still doesn't show up. RIOT please I only like LoL cause of the splash art and now I cannot even see it. Why does this have to happen? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
There appears to be an issue with loading screen splashes for some old video cards or cards running older drivers.

I looked into it and there is a team working on resolving this issue right now, having some success with reproducing the issue. So hopefully we'll have a fix for this out soon.
